00008 nifti_arm_status::nifti_arm_status() {
00009         current_elbow = 0;
00010         current_shoulder = 0;
00011         position_elbow = 0;
00012         position_shoulder = 0;
00013         internal_height = 0;
00014         height = 0;
00015         status = Unknown;
00016 }
00017 
00018 void nifti_arm_status::getstatus(diagnostic_updater::DiagnosticStatusWrapper &stat){
00019         stat.add("Current (shoulder)", current_shoulder);
00020         stat.add("Current (elbow)", current_elbow);
00021         stat.add("Position (shoulder)", position_shoulder);
00022         stat.add("Position (elbow)", position_elbow);
00023         stat.add("Position (pan)", position_pan);
00024         stat.add("Position (tilt)", position_tilt);
00025         stat.add("Desired height", height);
00026         stat.add("Internal height", internal_height);
00027         switch(status)
00028         {
00029          case Ok: stat.summary(diagnostic_msgs::DiagnosticStatus::OK, "Everything seems Ok.");
00030                  break;
00031          case Initializing: stat.summary(diagnostic_msgs::DiagnosticStatus::OK, "Device initializes.");
00032                  break;
00033          case Homing: stat.summary(diagnostic_msgs::DiagnosticStatus::OK, "Device is in homing mode.");
00034                  break;
00035          case Error: stat.summary(diagnostic_msgs::DiagnosticStatus::ERROR, "Device is in Error mode.");
00036                  break;
00037          case Manual: stat.summary(diagnostic_msgs::DiagnosticStatus::OK, "Device is in manual mode. Will not react on height commands.");
00038                  break;
00039          case Deactivated: stat.summary(diagnostic_msgs::DiagnosticStatus::WARN, "Device is deactivated. Need manual reactivation.");
00040                  break;
00041          default: stat.summary(diagnostic_msgs::DiagnosticStatus::WARN, "Unknown Status");
00042         }
00043 
00044 }
